PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Aggregation ability
2. Strength

Explanation:

1. Aggregation ability: This is a property of the PffBB-n polymers that refers to their ability to come together or aggregate. The paragraph mentions that the aggregation ability of these polymers increases with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains.
2. Strength: This is another property of the PffBB-n polymers that refers to their ability to withstand external forces or loads. The paragraph mentions that the strength of these polymers also increases with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Aggregation ability
2. Strength

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties. The other entities, such as "size of the alkyl side chains" and "Figure 1" are not relevant to the value of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Aggregation ability |
| Strength |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
